nodes.text: Tulak Hord's lightsaber was the weapon of Tulak Hord, a Sith Lord of the original Sith Empire. Along with many of Hord's artifacts, the lightsaber was lost in the years after the Sith's death, but the Sith Lord Darth Marr discovered the weapon on the planet Dromund Fels sometime before 3678 BBY, shortly before his ascension to the reconstituted Sith Empire's ruling Dark Council.

Tulak Hord's lightsaber was first mentioned in the "Legacy of Tulak Hord" Codex entry in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011. Darth Marr appears with a lightsaber in the game itself, though it is not known whether Marr kept Hord's lightsaber for his own personal use.

The lightsaber is available for purchase in the game's "Cartel Market". As such, it can be assumed that Marr did not use Hord's lightsaber, as Marr's saber model differs greatly to that of Tulak Hord's.
